fields.Name: Agent Memory Cleanup - Daily at 3 AM UTC
fields.Description: Archives stale notes and examples based on per-agent retention policies. Archives notes not accessed within NoteRetentionDays (default 90), examples with SuccessScore < 50 after ExampleRetentionDays (default 180), and any items past their ExpiresAt timestamp.

Configuration.InitialMessage: Archive stale notes and examples based on retention policies
